name: Spooky Shotgun Wedding Specialties Inc.
description:
Shotgun Marriage noun: shotgun wedding an enforced or hurried wedding, especially because the bride is pregnant.

Spooky Shotgun Wedding Specialties Inc. is a casual game about "creating" (or rather matching) true love and performing shotgun weddings (We really can't claim to know what happens in the dressing room between ghosts). Frantically check ghosts into your speed dating extravaganza before they lose interest and harm your YALP! reviews! Once they're in, ghosts can be shy so you'll have to match them up with someone who is compatible with at least one interest before they again run out of patience and leave, taking your reputation as a fine business with them! Once you've found their true love you can perform the ceremony and with it, a great review!

Created for the Mini-jam 117: Ghosts game jam!

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move

Shift to run

E to activate/use the front desk/altar

Click with the mouse to pair ghosts, hover to show the interests you've given them
